message.message:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
I caught a shark on a sailboat, but not JAWS :)
Wait a minute. I didn't know you liked to fish. How is this news just coming to me now?! When are we going fishing?
This was on Twitter/FB for like 5 seconds while I was testing! Anyways, I'm salmon fishing next weekend, but may do some crabbing this week I'll let you know!
you know I'd never feed it to you ;)
I'm sorry for sneaking tilapia onto your plate. :P
My friend ,please use common sense. How much fat does a 100g tilapia fillet contain? Do think about it,after all your brains are not there just to fill the space between your ears.

Honestly... what is this sustainable fish thing that you're talking about... like we should be eating chickens that are grown in a lab... you really think that you're doing a body good... why don't you go hug a tree... quack...
